sentence.text: We will systematically examine seven genes (CHN1, MDH1, PCP4, biological_process, SLC14A1, SNAP25 and VSNL1) that are altered in the three neurodegenerative diseases.

Three neurodegenerative diseases [Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (signal transduction), Parkinson's disease (PD) and Alzheimer's disease (AD)] have many characteristics like pathological mechanisms and genes.
